Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The eighth sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The photographs show the integration of fighters of the South Viernamese National Liberation Front with the people.The Mao quotation reads "The army must be integrated with the people so that in the eyes of the people the army can be seen as their own army. This army will be even more invincible in the world...."
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
